Name: oid
Description: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: subconninfo
Description: connection string to the upstream database

Name: subdbid
Description: oid of the database which the subscription resides in

Name: subenabled
Description: if true, the subscription is enabled and should be replicating.

Name: subpublications
Description: array of subscribed publication names. these reference the publications on the publisher server. for more on publications

Name: subslotname
Description: name of the replication slot in the upstream database (also used for the local replication origin name); null represents none

Name: subsynccommit
Description: contains the value of the synchronous_commit setting for the subscription workers.
